Bars

Aside from top bar and nav bar, There are some element that can be used to have an awesome bars.



Basic Setup

Use a class name ".bar".

HTML example markup
<div class="bar">...</div>


Simple Bar

An element that can be used for a simple container with styles. Very useful if you need a heading with styled background or anything.

Heading

Heading

Heading

Heading

Heading


HTML example markup
<div class="bar">
	<h4>...</h4>
</div>
<div class="bar default">
	<h4>...</h4>
</div>
<div class="bar primary">
	<h4>...</h4>
</div>
<div class="bar secondary">
	<h4>...</h4>
</div>
<div class="bar tertiary">
	<h4>...</h4>
</div>


Alert Bar

A normal bar with an alert message. Can be styled in different colors, for alerting purposes.

Completed! Congratulations, it is sucessful!
Error! You miss something, hit back
Important! This is an important message!

HTML example markup
<div class="bar completed">...</div>
<div class="bar error">...</div>
<div class="bar important">...</div>


SASS Configuratoin Variables

// Bar - Basic Styling
$bar-bg: $color-gray-lighten !default;
$bar-color: $color-default !default;
$bar-border: 1px solid darken($color-gray-lighten, 10%) !default;

// Bar - padding
$bar-padding-top: 10px !default;
$bar-padding-bottom: 10px !default;
$bar-padding-left: 10px !default;
$bar-padding-right: 10px !default;

// Bar - margin bottom
$bar-margin-bottom: 10px !default;

See config.scss for complete reference.
